trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.7 migration guide | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.7 migration guide | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Procedures to update ATA to version 1.7

trans-unit.source: ATA update to 1.7 migration guide
trans-unit.target: ATA update to 1.7 migration guide

trans-unit.source: The update to ATA 1.7 provides improvements in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: The update to ATA 1.7 provides improvements in the following areas:

trans-unit.source: New detections
trans-unit.target: New detections

trans-unit.source: Improvements to existing detections
trans-unit.target: Improvements to existing detections

trans-unit.source: Updating ATA to version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Updating ATA to version 1.7

trans-unit.source: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.7 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).
trans-unit.target: If ATA is not installed in your environment, download the full version of ATA which includes version 1.7 and follow the standard installation procedure described in [Install ATA](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/install-ata).

trans-unit.source: If you already have ATA version 1.6 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your deployment.
trans-unit.target: If you already have ATA version 1.6 deployed, this procedure will walk you through the steps necessary to update your deployment.

trans-unit.source: You cannot install ATA version 1.7 directly on top of ATA version 1.4 or 1.5.
trans-unit.target: You cannot install ATA version 1.7 directly on top of ATA version 1.4 or 1.5.

trans-unit.source: You must install ATA version 1.6 first.
trans-unit.target: You must install ATA version 1.6 first.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.7:
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to update to ATA version 1.7:

trans-unit.source: [Download update 1.7](http://www.microsoft.com/evalcenter/evaluate-microsoft-advanced-threat-analytics)
trans-unit.target: [Download update 1.7](http://www.microsoft.com/evalcenter/evaluate-microsoft-advanced-threat-analytics)

trans-unit.source: In this version of, the same installation file (Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe) is used for installing a new deployment of ATA and for upgrading existing deployments.
trans-unit.target: In this version of, the same installation file (Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe) is used for installing a new deployment of ATA and for upgrading existing deployments.

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Update the ATA Gateways
trans-unit.target: Update the ATA Gateways

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Update the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Update the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Back up your database: (optional)
trans-unit.target: Back up your database: (optional)

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running as a virtual machine and you want to take a checkpoint, shut the virtual machine down first.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center is running on a physical server, follow the recommended procedure to [back up MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.org/manual/core/backups/).

trans-unit.source: Run the installation file, **Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe**, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.
trans-unit.target: Run the installation file, **Microsoft ATA Center Setup.exe**, and follow the instructions on the screen to install the update.

trans-unit.source: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Welcome** page, select your language and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: If you didn't enable automatic updates in version 1.6, you will be prompted to set ATA to use Microsoft Update for ATA to remain up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: If you didn't enable automatic updates in version 1.6, you will be prompted to set ATA to use Microsoft Update for ATA to remain up-to-date.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Update page, select **Use Microsoft Update when I check for updates (recommended)**.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Update page, select **Use Microsoft Update when I check for updates (recommended)**.

trans-unit.source: ![Keep ATA up to date image](media/ata_ms_update.png) This will adjust the Windows settings to enable updates for other Microsoft products (including ATA), as seen here.
trans-unit.target: ![Keep ATA up to date image](media/ata_ms_update.png) This will adjust the Windows settings to enable updates for other Microsoft products (including ATA), as seen here.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows auto-update image](media/ata_installupdatesautomatically.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Windows auto-update image](media/ata_installupdatesautomatically.png)

trans-unit.source: In the **Data migration** screen, select whether you want to migrate all or partial data.
trans-unit.target: In the **Data migration** screen, select whether you want to migrate all or partial data.

trans-unit.source: If you choose to migrate only partial data, your previously captured network traffic and behavior profiles will not be migrated.
trans-unit.target: If you choose to migrate only partial data, your previously captured network traffic and behavior profiles will not be migrated.

trans-unit.source: This means that it will take three weeks before the abnormal behavior detection has a complete profile to enable anomalous activity detection.
trans-unit.target: This means that it will take three weeks before the abnormal behavior detection has a complete profile to enable anomalous activity detection.

trans-unit.source: During those three weeks, all other ATA detections will function properly.
trans-unit.target: During those three weeks, all other ATA detections will function properly.

trans-unit.source: The **Partial** data migration takes much less time to install.
trans-unit.target: The **Partial** data migration takes much less time to install.

trans-unit.source: If you select **Full** data migration, it may take a significant amount of time for the installation to complete.
trans-unit.target: If you select **Full** data migration, it may take a significant amount of time for the installation to complete.

trans-unit.source: The estimated amount of time and the required disk space, which are listed on the **Data Migration** screen, depend on the amount of previously captured network traffic you had saved in previous versions of ATA.
trans-unit.target: The estimated amount of time and the required disk space, which are listed on the **Data Migration** screen, depend on the amount of previously captured network traffic you had saved in previous versions of ATA.

trans-unit.source: Before selecting **Partial** or **Full**, make sure to check these requirements.
trans-unit.target: Before selecting **Partial** or **Full**, make sure to check these requirements.

trans-unit.source: ATA data migration
trans-unit.target: ATA data migration

trans-unit.source: Click **Update**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Update**.

trans-unit.source: After you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.
trans-unit.target: After you click Update, ATA is offline until the update procedure is complete.

trans-unit.source: After the ATA Center update completes successfully, click **Launch** to open the **Update** screen in the ATA console for the ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: After the ATA Center update completes successfully, click **Launch** to open the **Update** screen in the ATA console for the ATA Gateways.

trans-unit.source: ![Update success screen](media/migration center success.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Update success screen](media/migration center success.png)

trans-unit.source: In the **Updates** screen, if you already set your ATA Gateways to automatically update, they will update at this point, if not, click **Update** next to each ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: In the **Updates** screen, if you already set your ATA Gateways to automatically update, they will update at this point, if not, click **Update** next to each ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: ![Update gateways image](media/migration update gw.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Update gateways image](media/migration update gw.png)

trans-unit.source: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.
trans-unit.target: Update all the ATA Gateways to make sure ATA functions properly.

trans-unit.source: The configured Syslog listener port on all Gateways will be changed to 514.
trans-unit.target: The configured Syslog listener port on all Gateways will be changed to 514.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.source: [Check out the ATA forum!](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/security/home?forum=mata)
trans-unit.target: [Check out the ATA forum!](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/security/home?forum=mata)
